topic.title: Medication Series Number Observation - conformance rules

section.p: The medication series number observation can be used to indicate which in a series of administrations a particular administration represents (e.g. "hepatitis B vaccine number 2 was administered on Feb 07, 2004).

ol.li: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "30973-2" Dose number (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)
SHALL contain [1..1] value, where its data type is INT
SHALL conform to CDA Clinical Statement
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "30973-2" Dose number (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] value, where its data type is INT
